Podcast Editor Job Request

I am looking for a video and audio podcast editor who is an expert in editing in Descript.

There will also be a few Zoom-recorded podcasts and iPhone-recorded .mp4 podcasts that also need to be edited for audio and video.

I have a new podcast, and we’re (my podcast partner and I) creating podcast episodes in batch to be released to the podcast platforms once a week.

We use Squascast / Descript  / Fusebox.fm as our tools.

What the role involves from Descropt, Zoom .mp4, and iPhone .mp4):
- Remove background noise, adjust audio levels, and add music or sound effects as needed (we have our own music)
- Use our pre-recorded intro and outro files
- Edit out mistakes, awkward pauses, and irrelevant content to create a polished final product.
- Maintain organized files and manage episode timelines to meet release schedules.
- Provide creative input on improving the overall sound and flow of the podcast.
- Stay updated with industry trends and incorporate best practices in podcast editing.
- Include short clips for social media with captions
- Create short, interesting 15-30 second clips from the podcast for the start of the podcast along with the theme music (music is supplied by us)
- Use Descript AI tools to generate copy for social media, blogs and newsletters
- Integrate the podcast episodes with our WIX website

If you don't use Descript regularly, please don't apply for this role. If you've used Descript for "1 or 2 jobs" then this opportunity is not for you.

Thanks a lot and we look forward to hearing from you!

item.title: Social Media Video and Slideshow Content Creator / Profile Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a dedicated individual to join our team and take over the creation and management of short-form faceless videos and slideshows for our TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube channels. This role involves using provided templates and AI instructions to produce and schedule content, ensuring a consistent and engaging presence across all platforms.

Responsibilities:

- Create short-form faceless videos using CapCut.
- Create slideshows using Figma.
- Use two slideshow templates and three short-form video templates.
- Schedule and post 4-5 pieces of content daily on TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube using scheduling software.
- Utilise ChatGPT-4 for content creation and scheduling to enhance efficiency.
- Maintain a consistent posting schedule.
- Collaborate with the team to ensure content aligns with brand guidelines and goals.
- Manage login credentials securely.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in social media content creation, particularly for TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube.
- Proficiency with CapCut for video creation and Figma for slideshow creation.
- Familiarity with AI tools like ChatGPT-4.
- Experience with scheduling software for social media posts.
- Strong organisational and time management skills.
- Attention to detail and ability to follow provided templates and instructions.
- Reliable internet connection and ability to work independently.
- Availability to work 2-3 hours per day.

Additional Information:

- This is a remote position.
- Training and support will be provided to ensure a smooth transition.
- Competitive compensation based on experience and performance
